resources.string: This will find HCF and LCF of n numbers, these numbers are to be separated by comma
This will check if the number is a prime number or not. It also outputs next and previous prime numbers of the given number.
This will find the prime factors of the given numbers
This will find the prime numbers between two numbers \'start\' and \'end\', both inclusive. For e.g., if start = 1 and end = 11 so the output will be 2, 3, 5, 7, 11

This will calculate the remainder obtained upon dividing the result of an expression with a number \'modulo\'. An expression (can be a number) and a modulo (number) is taken as input. For e.g. 3^999 when divided by 7 leaves remainder 5.
